turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Javier, I was wondering if you could place an order for me at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what area will you be in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be in the Fort Lauderdale, Florida area.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a location in Lauderdale By the Sea, 4854 N Federal Hwy Fort Lauderdale, FL

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, and what is the telephone number?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, what types of beverages can I expect to find there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, they have lattes, tea, chai style lattes, citrus defenders, lemonades, infusions, cold foam brews, regular coffee, iced coffee, and espressos.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Some of my coworkers are dairy free. Can you tell me the different types of milk they offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have 5 kinds: almond, non-fat, coconut, whole milk, 2% and Soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like to add flavor to my coffee. Is there a way to do that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, they offer a variety of flavored syrups including: vanilla (available sugar-free) caramel (available sugar-free) cinnamon dolce (available sugar-free) hazelnut (available sugar-free) toffee nut. peppermint (available sugar-free seasonally), classic, and hazelnut. They have sugar free and lower fat options.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow, that is awesome. I wonder if I can mix a few.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can customize any way you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are offered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The sizes for drinks are short, tall, grande, venti, and treinta; grande being the medium size. There are 16 oz in a grande size drink at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I would like 1 venti Pike place roast coffee, 1 hezelnut sweet cream cold brew, 1 venti regular brew with whipped cream, 1 venti frappuccino, and 2 espressos with vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all. Thank you for your time and help with all of this.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so your order will be ready shortly at the Lauderdale By the Sea Starbucks Location. Your confirmation and receipt will be sent to you via text so please keep your phone handy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will do. Thank you and talk to you soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, happy to help. Goodbye.
